name: La marcha de la esperanza

Filming locations: Campo de San Martín, Oñate, Guipúzcoa, País Vasco, Spain

description: Documentary on the Commemoration of the "First Interprovincial Day of the Spanish Youth Organization (OJE), in Oñate, Guipúzcoa, Spain. In a youth camp, activities such as stone lifting and log cutting are carried out.
